context_bundle.summary: HashiCorp Consul provides service discovery, health checking, KV store, and service mesh: Register services with health checks, DNS/HTTP API for service lookup, distributed KV store for configuration, Connect for service-to-service encryption (mTLS).

onboarding.quick_start: HashiCorp Consul provides service discovery, health checking, KV store, and service mesh: Register services with health checks, DNS/HTTP API for service lookup, distributed KV store for configuration, Connect for service-to-service encryption (mTLS).
common_patterns: Service discovery: Register with health check, query via DNS or HTTP
KV store: Watch for config changes, atomic compare-and-swap
Leader election: Create session with TTL, acquire lock, renew lease
Health checks: HTTP endpoint, TCP port, script execution
